text: Lucho Avilés (30 April 1938 – 8 June 2019) was a Uruguayan-born Argentine journalist and television presenter.Murió Susana Fontana He was born in Uruguay's capital city Montevideo. His first work in Argentina was for Crónica newspaper. In 1965 he moved to Argentina and became an Argentine citizen. He died on 8 June 2019 in Buenos Aires from a heart attack at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Argentine writers Category:Argentine journalists Category:Writers from Montevideo Category:Argentine television presenters
